--- select_singer_with_full_join.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers AS A,
  Singers AS B

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.Join{
        Op:     ",",
        Method: "",
        Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        Left:   &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 18,
            NameEnd: 25,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*ast.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &ast.AsAlias{
            As:    26,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 29,
              NameEnd: 30,
              Name:    "A",
            },
          },
          Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
        },
        Right: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 34,
            NameEnd: 41,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*ast.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &ast.AsAlias{
            As:    42,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 45,
              NameEnd: 46,
              Name:    "B",
            },
          },
          Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
        },
        Cond: nil,
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers AS A, Singers AS B
